android.widget
类 ImageView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.widget.ImageView
所有已实现的接口：
Drawable.Callback, KeyEvent.Callback
直接已知子类：
ImageButton
public class ImageView
extends View

Displays an arbitrary image, such as an icon. The ImageView class can load images from various sources (such as resources or content providers), takes care of computing its measurement from the image so that it can be used in any layout manager, and provides various display options such as scaling and tinting.

嵌套类摘要
static class ImageView.ScaleType
          Options for scaling the bounds of an image to the bounds of this view.

方法详细信息

invalidateDrawable

public void invalidateDrawable(Drawable dr)
从类 View 复制的描述
Invalidates the specified Drawable.

指定者：
接口 Drawable.Callback 中的 invalidateDrawable
覆盖：
类 View 中的 invalidateDrawable
参数：
dr - the drawable to invalidate

setAdjustViewBounds

Set this to true if you want the ImageView to adjust its bounds
 to preserve the aspect ratio of its drawable.





参数：
adjustViewBounds - Whether to adjust the bounds of this view
 to presrve the original aspect ratio of the drawable









setMaxWidth


An optional argument to supply a maximum width for this view. Only valid if
 setAdjustViewBounds(boolean) has been set to true. To set an image to be a maximum of 100 x
 100 while preserving the original aspect ratio, do the following: 1) set adjustViewBounds to
 true 2) set maxWidth and maxHeight to 100 3) set the height and width layout params to
 WRAP_CONTENT.
 
 

 Note that this view could be still smaller than 100 x 100 using this approach if the original
 image is small. To set an image to a fixed size, specify that size in the layout params and
 then use setScaleType(android.widget.ImageView.ScaleType) to determine how to fit the image within the bounds.
 






参数：
maxWidth - maximum width for this view









setMaxHeight


An optional argument to supply a maximum height for this view. Only valid if
 setAdjustViewBounds(boolean) has been set to true. To set an image to be a maximum of 100 x
 100 while preserving the original aspect ratio, do the following: 1) set adjustViewBounds to
 true 2) set maxWidth and maxHeight to 100 3) set the height and width layout params to
 WRAP_CONTENT.
 
 

 Note that this view could be still smaller than 100 x 100 using this approach if the original
 image is small. To set an image to a fixed size, specify that size in the layout params and
 then use setScaleType(android.widget.ImageView.ScaleType) to determine how to fit the image within the bounds.
 






参数：
maxHeight - maximum height for this view









getDrawable


public Drawable getDrawable()




Return the view's drawable, or null if no drawable has been
        assigned.















setImageResource


Sets a drawable as the content of this ImageView.





参数：
resId - the resource identifier of the the drawable









setImageURI


Sets the content of this ImageView to the specified Uri.





参数：
uri - The Uri of an image

参数：
drawable - The drawable to set










setImageBitmap


Sets a Bitmap as the content of this ImageView.





参数：
bm - The bitmap to set

setSelected


public void setSelected(boolean selected)




从类 View 复制的描述


Changes the selection state of this view. A view can be selected or not.
 Note that selection is not the same as focus. Views are typically
 selected in the context of an AdapterView like ListView or GridView;
 the selected view is the view that is highlighted.





覆盖：
类 View 中的 setSelected






参数：
selected - true if the view must be selected, false otherwise










setImageLevel


Sets the image level, when it is constructed from a 
 LevelListDrawable.





参数：
level - The new level for the image.









setScaleType


public void setScaleType(ImageView.ScaleType scaleType)




Controls how the image should be resized or moved to match the size
 of this ImageView.





参数：
scaleType - The desired scaling mode.










getScaleType


public ImageView.ScaleType getScaleType()




Return the current scale type in use by this ImageView.





另请参见：
ImageView.ScaleType










getImageMatrix


public Matrix getImageMatrix()




Return the view's optional matrix. This is applied to the
        view's drawable when it is drawn. If there is not matrix,
        this method will return null.
        Do not change this matrix in place. If you want a different matrix
        applied to the drawable, be sure to call setImageMatrix().















setImageMatrix


public void setImageMatrix(Matrix matrix)
















onCreateDrawableState


public int[] onCreateDrawableState(int extraSpace)




从类 View 复制的描述


Generate the new Drawable state for
 this view. This is called by the view
 system when the cached Drawable state is determined to be invalid.  To
 retrieve the current state, you should use View.getDrawableState().











参数：
extraSpace - if non-zero, this is the number of extra entries you
 would like in the returned array in which you can place your own
 states.

返回：
Returns an array holding the current Drawable state of
 the view.
另请参见：
View.mergeDrawableStates(int[], int[])










getBaseline


public int getBaseline()




从类 View 复制的描述


Return the offset of the widget's text baseline from the widget's top
 boundary. If this widget does not support baseline alignment, this
 method returns -1. 






覆盖：
类 View 中的 getBaseline







返回：
the offset of the baseline within the widget's bounds or -1
         if baseline alignment is not supported










setColorFilter


public final void setColorFilter(int color,
                                 PorterDuff.Mode mode)




Set a tinting option for the image.





参数：
color - Color tint to apply.
mode - How to apply the color.  The standard mode is
 PorterDuff.Mode#SRC_ATOP

setColorFilter


public void setColorFilter(ColorFilter cf)

参数：
cf - the colorfilter to apply (may be null)
